subject: Surfing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Horn’s exploration of new surf spots along the California coast in the 1940s and 1950s helped the sport grow from a subculture to an international pastime.
snippet: Mr. Horn’s exploration of new surf spots along the California coast in the 1940s and 1950s helped the sport grow from a subculture to an international pastime.
